name: Run Boy: Jungle Adventures
description:
The brave boy went for adventure in mysterious jungle for countless treasures. So, what you will see in this amazing journey;
The Boy runs and jumps in the jungle, he collects coins and escapes from tiger and monkey, also from a tribal warrior who guards the gold.
The game has many levels at the beginning they easy, but then it becomes more addictive and challenging after each. You will see nice HD graphic of the fairest landscape.( You will see a nice HD graphics of fairy jungle)
The platform for all ages, so what are you waiting for? Just download this app and spend time more enjoyable!

***How to play***
1. Just tap the screen to let the boy jump
2. The boy will run faster or slower after certain signs

***Features***
1. More than 100 levels!
2. Levels from easy to experience.
3. Cute and interesting characters
